bill_title: make an appropriation to the Board of Regents for a scientific research equipment grant matching fund.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to make an appropriation to the Board of Regents for a scientific research equipment grant matching fund. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. There is hereby appropriated to the Board of Regents one million dollars ($1,000,000), or so much thereof as may be necessary, from moneys deposited in the general fund from the earnings of the tobacco settlement trust fund created pursuant to § 5-12-57. The Board of Regents shall pledge so much of the moneys appropriated by this Act as may be necessary to meet the state-funded matching requirements established by certain federal and private scientific research equipment grant programs. 300 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.029 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
